attributes.action: Stop the eviction of Parents of Rioters. We did not evict MPs parents.
attributes.additional_details: Stop the immoral eviction of parents whose children were involved in the riots. It is another injust penalisation of the poorest most vunerable. It will only result in more crime. The parents of the MPs who looted and stole from the government did not lose their homes why are we targeting those most in need?
